thread.title: North Korea says it may reconsider summit with Trump

title: North Korea says it may reconsider summit with Trump
text:
North Korea says it may reconsider summit with Trump 7:06pm IST - 02:08
North Korea throws next month’s summit between Kim Jong Un and U.S. President Donald Trump into doubt by threatening to pull out of the meeting if Washington continues to push it for denuclearization. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
North Korea throws next month’s summit between Kim Jong Un and U.S. President Donald Trump into doubt by threatening to pull out of the meeting if Washington continues to push it for denuclearization.
